mapper.select: SELECT * FROM produce_certificate pc, ( select tc.certificate_id, sum(th.number) number, th.drawing_no, max(th.product_name) product_name,group_concat(th.product_no) product_no, th.material_no,max(th.test_Bar_Number) test_Bar_Number,max(th.test_Bar_Type) test_Bar_Type, max(th.batch_no) batch_no,max(th.texture) texture,max(th.weight) weight, ti.opt_id, ti.opt_name, ti.opt_ver, max(ti.sequence_order_by) sequence_order_by from produce_track_certificate tc left join produce_track_head th on tc.th_id = th.id left join produce_track_item ti on tc.ti_id = ti.id group by tc.certificate_id, th.drawing_no, th.material_no, ti.opt_id, ti.opt_name, ti.opt_ver) as track ${ew.customSqlSegment}
